verbs.description: [ARG1: ‘ Morning Joe’ host Joe Scarborough] [V: became] [ARG2: totally unglued] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday morning] [ARGM-ADV: following President Trump ’s public immigration debate earlier] ...
